title: My screen has a weird streak from when it fell off my desk
content:
As the title summarises, the screen has developed a weird streaky look from when it fell off my desk. Is that normal? Aren't these phones tested for such things before launch?

I bought the phone directly from Google. My warranty runs out in May. Can I send the phone to Google to replace the screen under warranty? If not, can I pay them to replace the screen?
